channel.title: CVE Feed for Commvault -- Service Pack 6
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Commvault -- Service Pack 6

item.title: CVE-2017-3195|2024-08-05T14:16:28.351Z -- commvault -- service%20pack%206
item.description: Commvault Edge Communication Service (cvd) prior to version 11 SP7 or version 11 SP6 with hotfix 590 is prone to a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability that could lead to arbitrary code execution with administrative privileges.
